targets.rawSql: SELECT time, value FROM metrics WHERE metric_type = 'event_processed' AND $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY time, value ORDER BY time
SELECT time_bucket('1 minute', time) as time, COUNT(*) as errors FROM metrics WHERE metric_type IN ('processing_error', 'invalid_event') AND $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT time_bucket('1 minute', time) as time, COUNT(*) as gaps FROM metrics WHERE metric_type LIKE 'gap_%' AND $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT time_bucket('1 minute', time) as time, COUNT(*) as late_events FROM metrics WHERE metric_type = 'too_late_event' AND $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY time ORDER BY time
SELECT metric_type, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(value) as total_value, AVG(value) as avg_value FROM metrics WHERE $__timeFilter(time) GROUP BY metric_type ORDER BY count DESC
